typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		aluguel_id as integer,
		data_de_aluguel as timestamp,
		inventario_id as integer,
		cliente_id as integer,
		data_de_devolucao as timestamp,
		funcionario_id as byte,
		ultima_atualizacao as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(output(
		cliente_id as integer,
		loja_id as byte,
		primeiro_nome as string,
		ultimo_nome as string,
		email as string,
		endereco_id as integer,
		ativo as boolean,
		data_criacao as timestamp,
		ultima_atualizacao as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@cliente_id == source2@cliente_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
